title: What are the best books for science and technology of the UPSC? - Quora
tags: Union Public Service Commission of India

response.answer_text: For Science and technology in UPSC, you can get your basics from NCERTS of science from 6th or 9th ( if you are good at science ). You can get these books or NCERT compilations along with solution books for free of cost in this website called Mypustak. But the main part in Science and Technology lies in connecting it with present. For this you need make a regular reading of News paper, probably The Hindu might help you much. Besides this you can also go with coaching materials that are available outside. You can also get them in Mypustak for free.
Just cover basic 6 to 10 science ncert …there is no special book for science and tech …just rely on current affairs magazine ..hindu reading
